skillTree.localised_description: Wild stallions that are ferocious and agile. Most are used by Kislev's horse archers.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A mighty spike of the hardest ice blasts forth to impale ranks of enemies like a well-aimed cannonball from below.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: This eldritch explosion propels lacerating shards of ice outwards, devastating anyone caught in its deadly squall.
Being a man in a woman's world has driven Vladimir to find every scrap and piece of knowledge that he can, knowledge that he brings forth at Boris' side.

ui_effects.localised_text: Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit

phases.onscreen_name: Missile Mirror: Projectiles fired by the unit are reflected back at it!

skillTree.localised_description: As if the enemy were caught in a blizzard or wading through treacle, the ice-cold aura slows any unit within range to a near-standstill.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A wielder of Ice Magic, a native form of Magic practised in the northern regions of Kislev, he is able to produce deadly spells of ice and cold. The last thing he remembers is helping the Grudgebringers fight undead, this does not seem to be the same world. Ursun is in pain and this may be the source of his mysterious appearance in this familiar yet unknown world.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Blizzard Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Hailstorm Upgraded"
